actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 106-387.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation and Recreation

official_title: A bill to amend the National Historic Preservation Act to reauthorize that Act, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Historic Preservation Extension Act of 1999

summary.text: National Historic Preservation Extension Act of 1999 - Amends the National Historic Preservation Act to authorize (current law requires) the Secretary of the Interior to administer grants to the National Trust for Historic Preservation.Authorizes appropriations through FY 2005 for the Historic Preservation Fund under such Act.Provides a priority in the selection by the head of a Federal agency of properties for preservation as historic sites of: (1) historic properties in historic districts; (2) other developed or undeveloped sites in historic districts; and (3) historic properties outside of historic districts. Requires any property rehabilitation or reconstruction to be architecturally compatible with the character of surrounding historic districts or properties.Extends through FY 2005 the Advisory Council on Historic Preservation.

titles.title: National Historic Preservation Extension Act of 1999
A bill to amend the National Historic Preservation Act to reauthorize that Act, and for other purposes.
